alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Franklin; Lauderdale; Lawrence; Limestone; Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 2:25PM CST until January 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST TUESDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy mixed precipitation. Additional snow and sleet accumulations of up to one to two inches. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 10 to 15 below zero. * WHERE...In Alabama, Lauderdale, Colbert, Franklin AL, Lawrence, Limestone and Madison counties. In Tennessee, Moore, Lincoln and Franklin TN counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 6 AM CST Tuesday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from midnight tonight to noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could result in hypothermia or frostbite if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Colbert; Franklin; Lauderdale; Lawrence; Limestone; Madison
